title: Sources
description: Array of sources used to generate the index.

kind.description: String enumeration giving the type of the source (e.g., Internet Archive item, or website snapshot).

name.description: Display name for the source. This corresponds with the item title for Internet Archive sources.

description.description: HTML description of the source. In the case of the Internet Archive sources, this corresponds with the top-level item description.

url.description: Direct download link to the asset used to generate the index. Corresponds with the specific file in an Internet Archive item.

html_url.description: URL of an HTML page associated with the index. In the case of website snapshots, this is the root of the website; for Internet Archive sources, it represents the item details page.

example.name: Psion 3-Lib Shareware Library June 2005
example.description: CD of the Psion 3-Lib Shareware library for Psion PDA's
